host.title: Host
host.description: Elasticsearch host address (e.g., localhost or elasticsearch.example.com)

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: API key for Elasticsearch authentication (alternative to username/password)

cloud_id.title: Cloud ID
cloud_id.description: Elasticsearch Cloud ID for cloud-hosted instances

index.title: Index Pattern
index.description: Elasticsearch index name or pattern (e.g., 'my-index' or 'logs-*')

max_threads.title: Max Threads
max_threads.description: Maximum number of parallel threads for data sync

retry_count.title: Retry Count
retry_count.description: Number of retry attempts for failed operations
